name: Washroom
short_description: A luxurious washroom filled with sculptures and various toiletries.
long_description: The wizard's washroom is inordinately ornate with small sculptures and lavish adornments. The mirror above the vanity has a frame that appears to be pure gold. You imagine the wizard who lives here (or lived here) wanted to spend their private time in splendor.

decorative doorway.description: The door is decorated with ornate designs of what appear to be golden flowers. A strange, glowing aura lays across the doorway that seems to ripple like water when you touch it.

toothbrush.description: The bristles on the brush curve slightly at the edges. Perhaps the wizard does not have the best brushing technique.

tube of paste.description: Is this some kind of toothpaste? It reads "RUST-BE-GONE". Perhaps not.

golden throne.description: The toilet seems to be be made out of solid gold! Makes you think twice about using it.

luxurious bath.description: The wizard seems to have spent a lot of time and effort designing the bath. The large, circular tub is almost 10 feet in radius, enough to fit several people. Sculptures of small cherubs holding little pitchers line the sides. Presumably the pitchers pour water when it is on. The tub is currently filled, although you find the water is cold when you dip your hand inside.
